感取: (かんしゅ) - feeling; sensing; understanding intuitively
感吟: (かんぎん) - emotional chanting or recitation
感嘆文: (かんたんぶん) - exclamatory sentence; exclamation
感嘆符: (かんたんふ) - exclamation point; exclamation mark
感圧ダイオード: (かんあつダイオード) - pressure sensitive diode
感圧接着剤: (かんあつせっちゃくざい) - pressure-sensitive adhesive
感奮: (かんぷん) - stirred up; inspired; moved to action
感度: (かんど) - sensitivity; reception (e.g. radio and television); severity (quake)
感度分析: (かんどぶんせき) - sensitivity analysis (e.g. in simulations)
感度良好: (かんどりょうこう) - loud and clear
感得: (かんとく) - deep realization (realisation)/profound realization; one's faith being transmitted to a deity and one's wish then being granted; unexpectedly obtaining something
感応: (かんおう) - inspiration; divine response; sympathy; induction
感応精神病: (かんのうせいしんびょう) - folie a deux
感応遺伝: (かんのういでん) - telegony; influence of a previous sire on the offspring of a female with a later sire (discredited theory of heredity)
感性界: (かんせいかい) - realm of the senses; sensible world; material world
感情にはしる: (かんじょうにはしる) - (ant: 冷静になる) act on one's emotions; be carried away by one's feelings; get (become) emotional
感情に走る: (かんじょうにはしる) - (ant: 冷静になる) act on one's emotions; be carried away by one's feelings; get (become) emotional
感情むきだし: (かんじょうむきだし) - effusiveness; gushing; shrillness
感情むき出し: (かんじょうむきだし) - effusiveness; gushing; shrillness
感情を害する: (かんじょうをがいする) - to hurt someone's feelings; to offend someone
感情を殺す: (かんじょうをころす) - to suppress one's emotions
感情剥き出し: (かんじょうむきだし) - effusiveness; gushing; shrillness
感情労働: (かんじょうろうどう) - emotional labour
感情表現: (かんじょうひょうげん) - expressing emotion; drawing facial expressions
感情論: (かんじょうろん) - argument based on emotion; sentimental argument
感情障害: (かんじょうしょうがい) - emotional disorder
感想文: (かんそうぶん) - written description of one's thoughts
感慨一入: (かんがいひとしお) - (yoji) one's heart is filled with even deeper emotion; feeling the emotion all the more deeply
感慨無量: (かんがいむりょう) - (yoji) deep emotion; one's mind is filled with thousand emotions
感染予防: (かんせんよぼう) - infection prevention; disease control
感染例: (かんせんれい) - case of infection
感染原: (かんせんげん) - source of infection
感染呪術: (かんせんじゅじゅつ) - contagious magic
感染源: (かんせんげん) - source of infection
感染症: (かんせんしょう) - infectious disease; infection
感染症対策: (かんせんしょうたいさく) - infection control measures
感染経路: (かんせんけいろ) - infection route; source of infection
感極まる: (かんきわまる) - to be overcome with emotion
感歎符: (かんたんふ) - exclamation point; exclamation mark
感泣: (かんきゅう) - being moved to tears
感涙: (kanrui) - tears (por estar profundamente comovido), tears of gratitude
感潮域: (かんちょういき) - estuary; estuarine basin; tidal area; tidal reach; tidal zone
感潮河川: (かんちょうかせん) - tidal river
感無量: (かんむりょう) - deep feeling; inexpressible feeling; filled with emotion
感熱プリンタ: (かんねつプリンタ) - thermal printer
感熱剤: (かんねつざい) - heat sensitizer; heat sensitiser
感熱印字装置: (かんねついんじそうち) - thermal printer
感熱式プリンタ: (かんねつしきプリンタ) - thermal printer
感熱紙: (かんねつし) - heat-sensitive paper; thermal paper
感知装置: (かんちそうち) - smoke or heat sensor or detector
感覚上皮: (かんかくじょうひ) - sensory epithelium; neuroepithelium
感覚的: (かんかくてき) - sensible; sensuous; intuitive
感覚神経: (かんかくしんけい) - sensory nerve
感覚細胞: (かんかくさいぼう) - sensory cell
感覚過敏症: (かんかくかびんしょう) - hypersensitivity
感覚遮断: (かんかくしゃだん) - sensory deprivation
感覚野: (かんかくや) - sensory area (of the cerebral cortex); sensorial area
感触: (kanshoku) - feel (ou seja, sensação tátil), touch, feeling, sensation, texture (e.g. food, cloth)
感謝の印: (かんしゃのしるし) - token of appreciation
